tasks.task: Participate in a webinar about grazing terminology.
subtasks: Describe mob grazing practices and stocking densities.
Differentiate rotational grazing from continuous grazing.

tasks.task: Grasp terms related to pastures and grazing.
subtasks: Define a paddock, cell, strip grazing, and bale grazing.
Understand the sward and forage residue.
Discuss the spring flush and summer slump.
Convert animal weights to the equivalent of a 1,000-pound beef cow.
Calculate animal unit days (AUD) and their relevance in grazing.
Differentiate between organic, natural, pasture-raised, grass-fed, and grass-finished products.
